de.gwdg.metadataqa.api.calculator

Class CalculatorFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gwdg.metadataqa.api.calculator.CalculatorFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class CalculatorFacade
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The central entry point of the application. It provides a facade to the subsystems.
    Author:
    Péter Király
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public CalculatorFacade(boolean runFieldExistence,
                        boolean runFieldCardinality,
                        boolean runCompleteness,
                        boolean runTfIdf,
                        boolean runProblemCatalog)
        Create calculator facade with configuration
        Parameters:
        runFieldExistence - Flag whether or not run the field existence measurement
        runFieldCardinality - Flag whether or not run the field cardinality measurement
        runCompleteness - Flag whether or not run the completeness measurement
        runTfIdf - Flag whether or not run the uniqueness measurement
        runProblemCatalog - Flag whether or not run the problem catalog

      • measure

        public String measure(String jsonRecord)
               throws com.jayway.jsonpath.InvalidJsonException
        Run the measurements with each Calculator then returns the result as CSV
        Parameters:
        jsonRecord - The JSON record string
        Returns:
        The result of measurements as a CSV string
        Throws:
        com.jayway.jsonpath.InvalidJsonException

      • measureWithGenerics

        protected <T extends XmlFieldInstance> String measureWithGenerics(String jsonRecord)
                                                           throws com.jayway.jsonpath.InvalidJsonException
        The generic version of measure. The class to pass should define the individual field's representations, so it is bound to the schema the record in. The class should be the extension of XmlFieldInstance
        Type Parameters:
        T - A class defining the internal representation of a fiel. It should be an extension of XmlFieldInstance
        Parameters:
        jsonRecord - The JSON record
        Returns:
        The result of measurements as a CSV string
        Throws:
        com.jayway.jsonpath.InvalidJsonException
